description: Object used to track the status of a Table.

state.description: The Table's state can be one of the following enumerations
state.name: TableState

changedOn.description: The date-time when the status of this table last changed.

progresssMessage.description: The current message of the progress tracker.

progresssCurrent.description: The progress current value indicates how much progress has been made. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

progresssTotal.description: The progress total indicates the total amount of work to complete. For example: If progressTotal = 100; and progressCurrent = 50; then the work is 50% complete.

errorMessage.description: When processing fails, this is a one line error message.

errorDetails.description: When processing fails, this is the full stack trace of the error.

totalTimeMS.description: The total run time (MS) of the last processing job.
